item.title: CVE-2024-20886|2024-06-04T06:42:35.452Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Live Wallpaper PC
item.description: Arbitrary directory creation in Samsung Live Wallpaper PC prior to version 3.3.8.0 allows attacker to create arbitrary directory.
